name: SCP - Inversion
description:
Relive the horrors of SCP Containment breach in this mod.

You play as the sole survivor of the SCP breach incident and it has been 20 since.

You are taken to the Recontained SCP Facility which is the same location as the SCP BREACH Incident, Escape Once again Facing the old and the new SCP'S.

The Facility has been kept unmaintained for the past 20 years, so get ready to walk past dark grimy walls.

(this is a standalone SCP Containment Breach mod)
